channel.title: [317 Pi] NPC Speech & Give Item
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm trying to add an NPC that will say "Welcome!" when you talk to it, and give you 5m gold, and make it so that you can only do it once. I tried building it through actionhandler, but everything I tried gave me errors. CAn anyone help?

item.description:

eger.toString(p.starter2).length());

eger.toString(p.starter2).length());

need the code

You never defined it.
its located in client

item.title: [317 Pi] NPC Speech & Give Item
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

in your ActionHandler.java
Look for

		switch(npcType) {
                                                 case 6138://resetstatsnpc
			c.getDH().sendDialogues(20, npcType);
			break;

add

                        case NpcIdYouWant://resetstatsnpc
			c.getDH().sendDialogues(1000, npcType);
			break;

in your dialoghandler.java

		case 1000;
                        if (c.starter2 == 0) {//MESSAGE1//Message2//NpcFace    //Name of npc
				sendNpcChat2("Welcome!", "",c.talkingNpc, "Welcomer");
				c.nextChat = 0;
                                c.starter2 = 1;
                                int ItemId = ####;
                                int ItemAmt = ####;
                                c.getItems().addItem(ItemId, ItemAmt);
                        }
		break;

then in your playersave.java

			characterfile.newLine();
			characterfile.write("starter2 = ", 0, 11);
			characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.starter2), 0, Integer.toString(p.starter2).length());

and ofcourse

					} else if (token.equals("starter2")) {
						p.starter2 = Integer.parseInt(token2);
